about_the_game:
ABOUT THIS CONTENT

A beautiful artbook with game art and never-before-seen concepts, accompanied with interesting info on various characters and locations from Unusual Findings.

CREDITS:

Artists:
Juan Manuel Afrinetti
Taylor Nestor

Design:
Anton Kartenov

name: Unusual Findings - Digital Artbook

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible

short_description: A beautiful artbook with game art and never-before-seen concepts, accompanied with interesting info on various characters and locations from Unusual Findings.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Russian*, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
